zh-Hant.member_wolf_desc: 熱愛美食與發呆，是嘎豬窩的創始狼！語助詞是「嘎！」
zh-Hant.member_pig_desc: 阿狼的妹妹，不會講話，但是可以用念力跟阿狼溝通。
zh-Hant.member_bo_nickname: 綽號：昂藍波、灰塵、大老鼠
zh-Hant.member_bo_desc: 會用眼神殺死主人的英短，是阿狼的好朋友（兼坐騎？）。
zh-Hant.member_chicken_desc: 原本住在老媽學姊家，後來招兵買馬來的
zh-Hant.footer_copyright: © 2025 嘎豬窩. 保留所有權利。
zh-Hant.blog_2507061_title: CHAVATY冰一波：焙茶濃、白桃清，嘎嘎好吃
zh-Hant.blog_2507061_summary: 藏身在表參道巷弄裡的 CHAVATY，外觀看起來低調，人潮卻一點都不低調！到底這家網紅甜點店是實力派還是純靠顏值？吃完會升天還是想喊退款？請繼續看狼吞虎嚥ㄟ食記！
zh-Hant.blog_2507051_title: 藍波三歲生日快樂！出走王終於服刑期滿？
zh-Hant.blog_2507051_summary: 今天是藍波的三歲生日🎉雖然他因為太愛離家出走，最近被關進外役監反省貓生，但他依然是偶們家最幸福、最有戲的仔。想知道藍波的願望有多有趣？趕緊點進來一起慶生吧！
zh-Hant.blog_2507031_title: 台灣冰淇淋比較濃，親戚猴仔沒偶萌嘎
zh-Hant.blog_2507031_summary: 一場看似平凡的 IKEA 探親之旅，卻意外遇見一位和自己「長得超像」的猴仔？再加上一球讓人疑問的冰淇淋味道對比，讓人不禁想問：到底發生了什麼事？嘎～
zh-Hant.blog_2507021_title: 比清酒樽更狂的收藏？來偶家驗貨！
zh-Hant.blog_2507021_summary: 雖說明治神宮的清酒樽牆很吸睛，但偶叔叔收藏的酒樽多到可以開展覽，來偶家拍照才是真內行！來看偶家的清酒牆～
zh-Hant.blog_2506291_title: 神聖的夫妻樹和偶的水餃幻想
zh-Hant.blog_2506291_summary: 在明治神宮見證神聖婚禮，眼前的夫婦楠讓人心生敬意——但某狼的腦袋裡，竟然只浮現水餃和國泰人壽？
zh-Hant.blog_2506281_title: 食品展不是吃喝，是搶拍美賊賊的畫面！
zh-Hant.blog_2506281_summary: 這次在臺北國際食品展，大家忙著品嚐美食，偶卻只有一個目標──跟漂亮的賊賊拍照！但老媽卻悄悄逼近，氣氛瞬間緊張起來。究竟接下來會發生什麼趣事？快跟著偶一起揭開這場食品展的狼式大冒險！
zh-Hant.blog_2506211_title: 小夜燈亮起，貓警長報到🐾 向辛苦的守護者致敬！
zh-Hant.blog_2506211_summary: 一年一度的警察節來啦！這次新竹市警察局特地設計兩款超~~~~可愛（跟偶一樣）又溫暖的禮物，向默默守護大家的警察們致敬～想知道是什麼？一起來開箱吧！
zh-Hant.blog_2506191_title: 狼出沒！在明治神宮偷個東京小午覺
zh-Hant.blog_2506191_summary: 走進明治神宮，穿過壯觀鳥居後竟是意外清涼的綠色秘境！不只適合參拜，還能慢跑、散步、放空，甚至讓狼狼想直接躺下小睡一場。東京竟藏有這樣的療癒角落？一探究竟吧！

en.member_wolf_desc: Loves food and daydreaming, the founding wolf of WPC! His catchphrase is 'Ga!'
en.member_pig_desc: Wolf's younger sister, doesn't speak, but can communicate with Wolf telepathically.
en.member_bo_nickname: Nicknames: Ang Rambo, Dusty, Big Rat
en.member_bo_desc: A British Shorthair who can kill his owner with his eyes, Wolf's good friend (and ride?).
en.member_chicken_desc: Originally lived at Mom's friend's house, then recruited to join.
en.blog_2507061_title: CHAVATY Ice Cream Hit Parade: Roasty Hojicha & White Peach — totally YUM!
en.blog_2507061_summary: Tucked away in the stylish alleys of Omotesando, CHAVATY might look all quiet and classy on the outside—but the crowd? Total chaos (in a good way)! So here’s the million-yen question: is this Insta-famous dessert spot actually worth the hype, or just riding on its pretty face? Will these scoops send us to foodie heaven—or straight to refund town? Stick around and find out in our foodie adventure!
en.blog_2507051_title: 🎉 Happy 3rd birthday, Bobo! So the runaway king has finally finished serving his sentence, huh? 😆
en.blog_2507051_summary: It’s Bobo’s 3rd birthday today! Even though he’s been doing some serious soul-searching in “cat rehab” lately—thanks to his habit of running away—he’s still the most dramatic (and pampered) star of our family. Curious about what hilarious wish Bobo made this year? Click in and join the party!
en.blog_2507031_title: Taiwanese ice cream is way creamier—plus, cousin monkey’s got nothing on my cuteness!
en.blog_2507031_summary: It started as a simple visit to IKEA… until I ran into a monkey that looked exactly like me?! Add in a mystery scoop of ice cream with a questionable flavor, and suddenly things got weird. What on earth is going on? Gaaaa~
en.blog_2507021_title: Move over sake barrels—check out my insane collection! Wanna verify? Come inspect it at my place!
en.blog_2507021_summary: Sure, the sake barrel wall at Meiji Shrine is cool and all, but my uncle’s collection? Massive enough to launch a full-blown exhibit. The real pros come take pics with our sake wall. Come on over and say “cheese!”
en.blog_2506291_title: The sacred couple trees… and my dumpling daydream
en.blog_2506291_summary: Witnessing a wedding at Meiji Shrine, standing before the awe-inspiring sacred couple trees—so solemn, so majestic… and yet, all I could think about was dumplings and Cathay Life Insurance?! What's wrong with me?!
en.blog_2506281_title: Taipei Food show? More like a mission to snap pics with pretty sisters!
en.blog_2506281_summary: While everyone at the Taipei International Food Show was busy munching and sipping, I had just one goal—getting a photo with a gorgeous sister! But just when I struck a pose, MOM sneaks up like a ninja. Tension’s in the air! What happens next in this wild wolfy expo adventure? Stick with me to find out!
en.blog_2506211_title: When the night light glows... Meow! Chief Kitty's on duty! 🐾 Saluting our hardworking heroes in blue!
en.blog_2506211_summary: It’s that time of the year again—Taiwan Police Day is here! This year, the Hsinchu City Police Bureau has cooked up not one, but two suuuperrrr cute (just like me) and heartwarming gifts to honor our silent guardians. Curious what they are? Let’s unbox together! 🎁🐾
en.blog_2506191_title: Wolf on the loose! Sneaking a sneaky little nap at Meiji Shrine in Tokyo 🐺💤
en.blog_2506191_summary: Step into Meiji Shrine, and BAM! After passing that epic torii gate, you're suddenly in a breezy green wonderland! Not just for prayers—this place is perfect for jogging, strolling, zoning out… or if you're a sleepy wolf like me, plopping down for a quick nap. Who knew Tokyo was hiding such a magical chill-out spot? Let’s go sniff it out!
